Listened to all your files Bruce.  To tell the truth it is like eavesdropping on a telephone conversation.  Don't have to guess too much about what is being said by either party.  Pretty unbelievable really.  But I do believe.  Hope someday I can get even one word from the other party.  
   
  So, who was bored and did you do anything to amuse them?  Ron L

bhali333 <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
          hey guy's 

I posted some new files in the RS files 1-2-08 folder in the files 
section yesterday. did anybody get a chance to listen. If so how bout 
some feedback.

bruce

Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
